title: Pset_MaterialWoodBasedPanel
description: This is a collection of mechanical properties related to wood-based materials for panel-like products like plywood or OSB. The propositions given above for wood-based beam materials with respect to anisotropy, strength graduation according to element sizes (especially panel thickness) apply accordingly.

ApplicableStructuralDesignMethod.title: ApplicableStructuralDesignMethod
ApplicableStructuralDesignMethod.description: Determines whether mechanical material properties are applicable to 'ASD' = allowable stress design (working stress design), 'LSD' = limit state design, or 'LRFD' = load and resistance factor design.

InPlane.title: InPlane
InPlane.description: Mechanical properties with respect to in-plane load, i.e. for function as a membrane.

YoungModulusBending.title: YoungModulusBending
YoungModulusBending.description: Defining values: α; defined values: elastic modulus in bending.

YoungModulusTension.title: YoungModulusTension
YoungModulusTension.description: Defining values: α; defined values: elastic modulus in tension.

BendingStrength.title: BendingStrength
BendingStrength.description: Defining values: α; defined values: bending strength.

CompressiveStrength.title: CompressiveStrength
CompressiveStrength.description: Defining values: α; defined values: compressive strength.

TensileStrength.title: TensileStrength
TensileStrength.description: Defining values: α; defined values: tensile strength.

ShearStrength.title: ShearStrength
ShearStrength.description: Defining values: α; defined values: shear strength.

BearingStrength.title: BearingStrength
BearingStrength.description: Defining values: α; defined values: bearing strength of bolt holes, i.e. intrados pressure.

RaisedCompressiveStrength.title: RaisedCompressiveStrength
RaisedCompressiveStrength.description: Alternative value for compressive strength which may be used under material and code dependent conditions (e.g. if deformation is tolerable, or far from ends of the member); conditions should be stated in SELF\IfcProperty.Description.

ReferenceDepth.title: ReferenceDepth
ReferenceDepth.description: Depth in bending for which the mechanical properties are valid; provided as a means to check the integrity of material assignment.

OutOfPlane.title: OutOfPlane
OutOfPlane.description: Mechanical properties with respect to out-of-plane load, i.e. for function as a plate; tension zone of unbalanced layups is stressed in tension.

OutOfPlaneNegative.title: OutOfPlaneNegative
OutOfPlaneNegative.description: Mechanical properties with respect to out-of-plane load i.e. for function as a plate; compression zone of unbalanced layups is stressed in tension.
